sentences.sContent: Rumours of possible human cases in other parts of the country have been systematically followed up.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rumours of possible human cases in other parts of the country have been systematically followed up.
sentences.sCn: 已系统地对关于该国其它地区可能的人间病例的传闻进行跟踪。

sentences.sContent: Never before has anyone systematically looked for the last queen of Egypt.
sentences.sContent_eng: Never before has anyone systematically looked for the last queen of Egypt.
sentences.sCn: 以前没有人曾系统地寻找过这位埃及最后的女王。

words.tran: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的
组织化；系统化；制度化；组织主义
分类者；组织者；使体系化的人
系统化，体系化（systematize的过去式）
使系统化；使组织化；将…分类
使……系统化；把……分类；组织化
使系统化；使有秩序（等于systematize）

trans.tranCn: 有系统地, 有条理地
